languages.text: {n}Помолчав, Джай мрачно качает головой.{/n} "В прошлом он многое мне дал. Научил, позаботился и даже был добр. Я была бы последней сукой, если бы отплатила за это пулей в сердце. Просто не тревожь меня, Пощада. Я не хочу тебя убивать".

{n}After a few moments of silence, Jae grimly shakes her head.{/n} "He gave so much to me. He trained me, he took care of me, he was even kind to me. I'd be the worst kind of scumbag if I repaid him with a bullet in the heart. Just stay out of my way, Mercy. I don't want to kill you."
languages.original_text: {n}Помолчав, Джай мрачно качает головой.{/n} "В прошлом он многое мне дал. Научил, позаботился и даже был добр. Я была бы последней сукой, если бы отплатила за это пулей в сердце. Просто не тревожь меня, Пощада. Я не хочу тебя убивать".

I'd be the worst kind of scumbag if I repaid him with a bullet in the heart. Just stay out of my way, Mercy. I don't want to kill you."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

I'd be the worst kind of scumbag if I repaid him with a bullet in the heart. Just stay out of my way, Mercy. I don't want to kill you."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊沉默了片刻，随后面无表情地摇了摇头。{/n}“他为我付出了那么多。他训练我，照顾我，甚至对我很好。如果我报答他的方式，就是一枪射穿他的心脏，那我简直就是最卑鄙的人渣。别再挡我的路了，悯慈，我不想杀你。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a few moments of silence, Jae grimly shakes her head.{/n} "He gave so much to me. He trained me, he took care of me, he was even kind to me. I'd be the worst kind of scumbag if I repaid him with a bullet in the heart. Just stay out of my way, Mercy. I don't want to kill you."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊沉默了片刻，随后面无表情地摇了摇头。{/n}“他为我付出了那么多。他训练我，照顾我，甚至对我很好。如果我报答他的方式，就是一枪射穿他的心脏，那我简直就是最卑鄙的人渣。别再挡我的路了，悯慈，我不想杀你。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n} しばらくの沈黙の後、ジェイは不機嫌そうに首を横に振った。{/n}「彼はあたしに多くを与えてくれた。訓練してくれて、面倒を見てくれて、親切にしてくれた。あたしがあいつの心臓を撃ち抜くような仕打ちで恩を返したら、あたしは最低のクズ野郎になってしまう。邪魔をしないで、マーシー。殺したくないんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}After a few moments of silence, Jae grimly shakes her head.{/n} "He gave so much to me. He trained me, he took care of me, he was even kind to me. I'd be the worst kind of scumbag if I repaid him with a bullet in the heart. Just stay out of my way, Mercy. I don't want to kill you."

traits.locale_text: {n} しばらくの沈黙の後、ジェイは不機嫌そうに首を横に振った。{/n}「彼はあたしに多くを与えてくれた。訓練してくれて、面倒を見てくれて、親切にしてくれた。あたしがあいつの心臓を撃ち抜くような仕打ちで恩を返したら、あたしは最低のクズ野郎になってしまう。邪魔をしないで、マーシー。殺したくないんだ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tras varios momentos de silencio, Jae menea la cabeza con gesto severo.{/n} «Le debo mucho. Me entrenó, me cuidó e incluso me trató con amabilidad. Sería escoria de la peor catadura si se lo pagara con un tiro en el corazón. Aparta de mi camino, Mercy. No quiero tener que matarte».
languages.original_text: {n}After a few moments of silence, Jae grimly shakes her head.{/n} "He gave so much to me. He trained me, he took care of me, he was even kind to me. I'd be the worst kind of scumbag if I repaid him with a bullet in the heart. Just stay out of my way, Mercy. I don't want to kill you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras varios momentos de silencio, Jae menea la cabeza con gesto severo.{/n} «Le debo mucho. Me entrenó, me cuidó e incluso me trató con amabilidad. Sería escoria de la peor catadura si se lo pagara con un tiro en el corazón. Aparta de mi camino, Mercy. No quiero tener que matarte».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Après un silence de quelques instants, Jae secoue sombrement la tête.{/n} « Il a tant fait pour moi... Il m'a formée, il a pris soin de moi, il m'a même traitée avec gentillesse. Je serais la pire des ordures si je lui montrais ma reconnaissance en lui tirant une balle dans le cœur. Ne t'avise plus de croiser ma route, Mercy. Je n'ai pas envie de te tuer. »
languages.original_text: {n}After a few moments of silence, Jae grimly shakes her head.{/n} "He gave so much to me. He trained me, he took care of me, he was even kind to me. I'd be the worst kind of scumbag if I repaid him with a bullet in the heart. Just stay out of my way, Mercy. I don't want to kill you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après un silence de quelques instants, Jae secoue sombrement la tête.{/n} « Il a tant fait pour moi... Il m'a formée, il a pris soin de moi, il m'a même traitée avec gentillesse. Je serais la pire des ordures si je lui montrais ma reconnaissance en lui tirant une balle dans le cœur. Ne t'avise plus de croiser ma route, Mercy. Je n'ai pas envie de te tuer. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae schweigt kurz und schüttelt dann heftig den Kopf.{/n} "Er hat mir so viel gegeben. Er hat mich ausgebildet, er hat sich um mich gekümmert, er war irgendwie sogar nett zu mir. Ich wäre absoluter Abschaum, wenn ich das mit einer Kugel ins Herz zurückzahlen würde. Geht mir einfach aus dem Weg, Mercy. Ich will Euch nicht töten."
languages.original_text: {n}After a few moments of silence, Jae grimly shakes her head.{/n} "He gave so much to me. He trained me, he took care of me, he was even kind to me. I'd be the worst kind of scumbag if I repaid him with a bullet in the heart. Just stay out of my way, Mercy. I don't want to kill you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae schweigt kurz und schüttelt dann heftig den Kopf.{/n} "Er hat mir so viel gegeben. Er hat mich ausgebildet, er hat sich um mich gekümmert, er war irgendwie sogar nett zu mir. Ich wäre absoluter Abschaum, wenn ich das mit einer Kugel ins Herz zurückzahlen würde. Geht mir einfach aus dem Weg, Mercy. Ich will Euch nicht töten."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bir süre sessizliğe bürünen Jae, katı bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bana birçok şey kazandırdı. Beni eğitti, benimle ilgilendi, hatta bana iyi davrandı. Bu yaptıklarının karşılığını kalbine sıktığım bir kurşunla verirsem adiliğin en beterini yapmış olurum. Yoluma çıkma Merhamet. Seni öldürmek istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}After a few moments of silence, Jae grimly shakes her head.{/n} "He gave so much to me. He trained me, he took care of me, he was even kind to me. I'd be the worst kind of scumbag if I repaid him with a bullet in the heart. Just stay out of my way, Mercy. I don't want to kill you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir süre sessizliğe bürünen Jae, katı bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bana birçok şey kazandırdı. Beni eğitti, benimle ilgilendi, hatta bana iyi davrandı. Bu yaptıklarının karşılığını kalbine sıktığım bir kurşunla verirsem, adiliklerin en beterini yapmış olurum. Yoluma çıkma Merhamet. Seni öldürmek istemiyorum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
